This class can be tough, but if you stay on top of it and do your homework you'll at least get a "B". In order to get an "A" you'll need to work for it, and Tanya is more than happy to help. To the person that said homework was a guess- I think that is an overstatement...
She is a great teacher. She is always very friendly and willing to help. I wish there were more teachers like her!!! Definitely take her class!

Tanya brings a negative attitude into class every day. This destroys the classroom environment and discourages students to learn. Tanya is not very reliable when it comes to the syllabus and therefore, class becomes a guessing game in regards to what is due on any given day. I recommend avoiding her class.

Very good teacher. Funny and interesting class. Having taken spanish in high school the class was not too difficult. Mainly spanish culture and using past grammar to write about what you have learned. Sometimes unclear due to accent but easy to get used to and understand!
She is extremely nice and helpful. Her English is fantastic and her review activities are very helpful for the exams. I highly recommend this teacher. :)

Aida is amazing, because I took this class, I decided on being a Spanish minor. She does not collect homework, but does weekly hw checks (by a quiz where you give answers so be sure to check your answers) usually on Friday. Very easy, nice, and interesting. And she's funny too. Take her. Do it.

Amazing teacher! I really enjoyed taking this class with her. Activities were interesting and helpful. Homework checks and vocab at least once every week.Very helpful! Grades fairly on oral quizzes, test, and compositions. I would recommend her to anyone!!!

Great instructor.  Enthusiastic as well as knowledgeable.  Teaching method involes lots of small group activities and exercises.  Lectures presented w/ ppt VisAid.  Overall an excellent teachers.  Not too hard on the eyes either ;-)

Very great teacher! She had a lot of activities for us to do. Her powerpoints were also great. We played a lot of games that helped us with the tests and midterms. Very interested in what she was doing and always had a lot of fun. I would highly recommend to anyone who is taking Spanish.

Aida was soo much fun!!! She's from Colombia but speaks English great.  I would highly recommend her!!!  She make the funnyest power points and makes up really creative class activities. I had her for 103.66

Whitney was a very helpful teacher who wanted students to succeed. She tried to make class more fun and exciting even though I had it early in the morning, and she would be playing popular Spanish music every day when we walked in. It made me look forward to it more, even though some of the material was challenging. Likes participation!
Whitney is one of the best Spanish professors I've had. I would definitely recommend her.
Amazing teacher. she its incredibly helpful and her accent is very easy to understand

If attendance wasnt mandatory, anyone w/ a background in Spanish would not need to go. You talk about stories read in the hw & songs listened to for hw. Not culture based, as it is said to be. Half the time we dont talk in Spanish. The tests & hw are easy. She does not create the material, only teaches it. Not very knowledgeable but nice enough.

Senora Kahoun is so nice and extremely helpful. She's very thorough on everything she teaches and if students are struggling she tries to show down and help them out. It's obvious that she loves her job and loves the language and her energy is contagious. Definitely take Spanish with her if you can.

Senora Kahoun is so nice and extremely helpful. She's very thorough on everything she teaches and if students are struggling she tries to show down and help them out. It's obvious that she loves her job and loves the language and her energy is contagious. Definitely take Spanish with her if you can.

My favorite professor so far at OSU. So nice and fun, which makes learning the material easy and interesting. She really cares about students. I wish I could have her for every spanish class. She even shook everyones hand and wished everyone luck after handing in the final, just showing what a great person and professor she really is.

Kathi is AWESOME! Best teacher I've had at OSU by far! Really makes sure you understand material and is willing to help. Funny and easy to relate to because she's young. Homework quizzes help your grade, so even do the minimal amount of work and you're in for an A :)
one of the best professors in college at osu by far! she is such a great professor. i highly encourage you to have her if you can.

wow. awesome professor. believe it or not, she makes learning Spanish fun. easy in class exercises and the quizzes usually fall directly from the not-collected homework workbook. she loves Spanish and teaching it and you can tell. never makes a student feel stupid. take her class!
Kahoun is awesome. She is a very good teacher and gives you little ways of memorizing the material. I wold def recommend her. I wish I could have her for 103 but she is not teaching it =-(

awesome professor! so helpful and so sweet. not too easy but not too hard. i hated spanish before this, but i actually looked forward to class with her. shes patient and wont embarass you. take her!!!
N/A

She's an excellent professor. I learned a lot in this class because she challenged me a bit, but not too much. She's helpful, willing to meet with you and won't embarrass you if you make a mistake in class.
She's basically just awesome. She never makes you feel dumb even when you're stuttering in spanish like an idiot. She's one of the nicest people around.
She's basically just awesome. She never makes you feel dumb even when you're stuttering in spanish like an idiot. She's one of the nicest people around.

AWESOME TEACHER! she totally sparked an interest in spanish for me. i hated spanish before and now i actually like it...a little. prepare to study A LOT for the class though. she's super nice, cooperative, and makes the class fun. take with her!
Very nice in class and willing to help you before or after office hours. She fights for the students when the directions are not clear. She is also GORGEOUS!!
Most fair grader at OSU. She makes it easy for you to understand the material and is super nice.

She talks to us as if we were children says "oh you know a lot of words". Her Spanish is weird and I'm a native speaker. She is weird, but knows her stuff. I would rather have a weird, but smart professor.

I had Sarah for Spanish 430 and she was by far the best foreign language professor I had at Ohio State.  Sarah is easy to understand as she is a native to the English Language, and is always available after class if needed.  I would highly recommend her if you have to take spanish at Ohio State

boring and not clear on grading standards, which lead to some very low grades and very unhappy students. as a linguistics major, i already knew all of the material for this introductory class, but i still struggled to get an A. She was ridiculous.
Great teacher, actually cares about teaching! Go to class every day, without fail (as you should anyway, I mean come on, it's a foreign language.)
No Comments
No Comments
By far one of the best teacher's I have had, be it in language or anything else. Very helpful and very friendly.
Sarah was the best Spanish professor I ever had

Overall cool, laid back, and pretty funny guy. It was a two hour class and attendance was mandatory but he made it bearable. He was very informative and helpful about what was on the exams and tests. He went to a Ke$ha concert. I recommend his class.

Senora Halliday is the best. I HATE spanish, but rather enjoyed her class. She's well organized, funny, and if you don't understand something she has no problem explaining. You will understand spanish if you take her class!

ANNE IS AMAZING! I HATED SPANISH BEFORE I MET HER. SHE EXPLAINS THE MATERIAL SO WELL THAT I AM ACTUALLY EXCITED FOR 103. SHE LITERALLY BENDS OVER BACKWARDS FOR HER STUDENTS AND IS SO DOWN TO EARTH. SHE REMINDED ME OF MY MOM. SHE IS BY FAR ONE OF THE BEST THERE IS. TAKE HER CLASS!
Class is always enjoyable. There is always a comfortable sense of predictability and Senora Halliday is very approachable and down to Earth. She has the personality of your best friend's mom.

Anne was awesome!! She's really down to earth and you could tell that she has a genuine interest in teaching spanish. doesnt really speak spanish the whole time, which comes in handy for when shes explaining homework, conjugating, etc. I ended up with an A-.

Easily the best, not only spanish, overall professor that I have ever had in all my years in college.  I was very happy to end on such a high note having her as a teacher.  Very helpful, very understanding, all around wonderful person.  She made you feel better about yourself by just walking into the class room.  Mariana es la mejor.

The rater below says it all. Wonderful teacher (and pretty cute, too.) Friends that were better at spanish than I took other TAs and got lower grades. Take for a relatively easy A or at LEAST a B if you show up, do the homework and try at all.

WONDERFUL!!! She is must to take for spanish. She is VERY helpful and explains information in various ways so everyone understands. She is lenient on grading and she is understanding. Believe me, you will want to go to her class!

Best person to take for spanish. Very understanding with homeworks and small grammar mistakes. Will do her best to make sure you get a good grade in the class. Find her section of 104 and TAKE IT WITH HER!
Nicest teacher I have ever had. She is very lenient and is a fairly easy grader. As long as you do your homework you should get out with at least a B.
I'm so glad I had Mariana as a teacher. She's a wonderful person and is very enthusiastic about teaching and helping!

She is the best Spanish teacher.  This class will probably be the easiest A I will ever get in college.  All of the tests are easy and the homework takes about 15 minutes.  She gives exceptions and will bend rules for you.  She is super nice and makes class really enjoyable.

Tests are straightforward and 100% on material from class, hw takes 5 minutes tops, she speaks in spanglish which is helpful,extremely caring and nice, and on top of it all is very attractive and pretty with a romantic accent (she is from mexico city).
She is so adorable and nice, and a great teacher.
Probably the best Spanish teacher I've ever had!
She does a really good job preparing students for the test. Although does actually grade homework so don't expect the easy A on homework.

Good teacher who wants students to do well and she genuinely tries to help students. If you have to take 104 I would recommend her but I do not believe she is the easiest Spanish teacher, but she is helpful and you will learn in her class.

She's the best professor I've had so far at OSU cuz she can actually TEACH.  She makes sure you know exactly what the articles are about, and prepares you well for exams.  There are plenty of other profs here who could learn a thing or two from her...I wish she taught 250+
señora kong is the best teacher i have ever had! if you are taking 104 i highly recommend her class; you will love it! she is a very fun person and a great teacher!
Probably the best spanish teacher i have ever had! She is extremely helpful and has an awesome sense of humor!

She speaks spanish slowly with an english accent, which is good for GEC people but for Spanish major or minors she doesn't really improve spanish skills much. An easy class and a nice lady, just not that interesting or challenging. You might not be ready for 250.

She is a great teacher in that she has so many exercises in class that really reinforce the material.  Because of her diligence, studying for the exams is easy, and she gives great tips on what to study and what not to study.  Her Spanish accent is a little weak, and her class can get somewhat boring, but it is very easy and very informative.

She's a very cool teacher.  She speaks spanish very clearly and slowly and has you do somewhat boring, but certainly easy activities in class.  She always looks very attractive in her tight sweaters/pants btw too.
Kong was one of my favorite Spanish teachers. Ditto to everything below--she's very helpful, informative, and laid-back.

She is a very helpful, clear, effective teacher. She really cares about her students and wants them to progress in her class. She is very approachable for questions and will answer them all. As long as you go to class and do her activities for practice, you should do fine. She is one of the best, most effective teachers I've had here.
Nice and helpful. Very strict on attendance and tardiness. Gives handouts that are extremely helpful on the exams and final and was told by a classmate that she helps write them.

Such a great teacher!! She's tons of fun and really makes people interact with each other, which is what you want in a language class.  She's clear about what she wants, and the powerpoints she makes are helpful in explaining reading that is (sometimes) confusing.

Juliana is one of the most prepared instructors I have experienced in my college career.  She create  a great atmosphere and everything is always clear and easy to understand with her. I am very excited to continue my studies in Hispanic linguistics thanks to her.
Posts slides online. All you need to do well is to memorize those slides and come to class. Attendance is not mandatory, but you will need to practice the sounds and class is the best place for that.

Juliana is awesome!! She is so so nice and always willing to help out her students.  She tells you exactly what you need to know for tests, (which were pretty easy).  I would HIGHLY recommend her to fellow students.

Juliana is extremely helpful... Plus she is a native speaker. Attendance is not mandatory but I highly recommend you go- you will lose out on points/extra credit opportunities if you dont... She is very nice and understanding.  Excellent prof! :)

Awesome.  Always happy, always helpful, makes class enjoyable, and at the same time makes you learn Spanish.  She made us participate, but attendance was not mandatory.  I came to class anyways because it was so much better than all my other ones.  And agreed, pretty hot.  Highly recommended
Juliana was an amazing teacher, probably my favorite so far at osu.  she is very helpful and tries her best to make dry material interesting. i would definitely recommend taking her.

Juliana is a great GTA that was always willing to help her students. If you had additional questions should would be more then willing to help you after class. She did a great job preparing students for test. I got an A in her class. Show up, ask questions and you will do well in the class.
The hotest teacher i've ever seen...
I love this teacher, i always love her...

She is always smiling, up-beat, happy, and willing to help the students succeed.  She's an amazing teacher and I would highly recommend her!!
Fun and relatively easy class if you you read the stories.
Great professor! Helps students, is easy to understand, non-native speaker.  Extremely nice and fun!

Pretty good teacher. Some of the tests were kind of tough, but they were given throughout the entire department, so he didn't really have an say. He was very fair with grading the oral reports.

Great spanish instructor. Extremely willing to help students; was effective at communicating course material. Class could be a little formulaic, but wasn't bad. Participation is expected. Great teacher! Wants students to do well and I learned SO much! I learned AND UNDERSTOOD! With her as a teacher, you can learn, do well, and you won't be too overworked. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! Great teacher!!!

I had Diego for Spanish 250 and 403. He was a really funny & helpful teacher... very easy to approach. Homework is really important in the class.. but it is mostly graded on completion only.

I had Diego for 250 and 403 and he is one of my favorite professors. He made coming to class enjoyable and I always look forward to seeing him around campus. I would highly recommend taking a class with him!!!
Great teacher... if you turn in hw you get a 100% and re-write the notes from class on the test and you'll get an A for sure. Very nice, and is willing to help if you ask. Highly recommended.

Evelyn is a great GTA. She really loves literature and does a great job at helping the students understand the stories. She prepares students well for the exams. Come to class and ask questions and will do well.

wonderful teacher! i loved him! so easy to understand his spanish!

very fun!

dan is AWESOME

He was great! He is definitely one of the best teachers I have ever had. I really suggest taking his class. He is very willingly to help you if you need it and he does a great job of making sure everyone understands. I loved his class!!
Dan is the man. He made class fun and enjoyable to attend. He was very helpful and made spanish easier than i had expected. Your my G Dan!

Dan is awesome! He is a young enthusiastic professor that seemed to really enjoy spanish. He had a lot of extra activities that encouraged students to improve speaking and writing skills. He created a fun atmosphere that made spanish really interesting.

Dan is awesome!  He really helps you if you need it, he is an easy grader, and he is so funny.  He makes class really fun.  I hated Spanish before his class, but now I love it.

Awesome teacher, really nice and helpful.  He was really funny and made the class a lot of fun.

not the most clear explanations ever, but overall a good teacher willing to help... very easy grader.

Scatterbrained. Was constantly late due to her class before ours. Is very slow about returning emails. EXTREMELY easy class... Lowest midterm grade was a 89 in the whole class. She is quite scaterbrained and always pushed back due dates. Bubbley. Would take another class with her because of the easy grade and clear reviews.

Although she knows what she is doing, she doesn't help much. Doesnt get back to you in emails or through internet. Doesnt check email after 2 because of her kids, and just plain doesnt help you a whole lot.
